mapper.select: SELECT CODE_KANJ, CODE_NAME, VALUE1_KANJ, VALUE1, VALUE2_KANJ, VALUE2, VALUE3_KANJ, VALUE3, SORT_NUM, BIKO, DEL_FLG, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME = #{codeName} AND VALUE1 = #{value1}

SELECT CODE_KANJ, CODE_NAME, VALUE1_KANJ, VALUE1, VALUE2_KANJ, VALUE2, VALUE3_KANJ, VALUE3, SORT_NUM, BIKO, DEL_FLG, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME = #{codeName} AND VALUE1 = #{value1} FOR UPDATE
SELECT CODE_KANJ, CODE_NAME, VALUE1_KANJ, VALUE1, VALUE2_KANJ, VALUE2, VALUE3_KANJ, VALUE3, SORT_NUM, BIKO, DEL_FLG, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M_RDM_CODE_MST(CODE_KANJ, CODE_NAME, VALUE1_KANJ, VALUE1, VALUE2_KANJ, VALUE2, VALUE3_KANJ, VALUE3, SORT_NUM, BIKO, DEL_FLG, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID) VALUES (#{codeKanj}, #{codeName}, #{value1Kanj}, #{value1}, #{value2Kanj}, #{value2}, #{value3Kanj}, #{value3}, #{sortNum}, #{biko}, #{delFlg}, #{insShaYmd}, #{insShaId}, #{updShaYmd}, #{updShaId})
mapper.update: UPDATE M_RDM_CODE_MST SET CODE_KANJ = #{update.codeKanj},CODE_KANJ = NULL,VALUE1_KANJ = #{update.value1Kanj},VALUE1_KANJ = NULL,VALUE2_KANJ = #{update.value2Kanj},VALUE2_KANJ = NULL,VALUE2 = #{update.value2},VALUE2 = NULL,VALUE3_KANJ = #{update.value3Kanj},VALUE3_KANJ = NULL,VALUE3 = #{update.value3},VALUE3 = NULL,SORT_NUM = #{update.sortNum},SORT_NUM = NULL,BIKO = #{update.biko},BIKO = NULL,DEL_FLG = #{update.delFlg},DEL_FLG = NULL,INS_SHA_YMD = #{update.insShaYmd},INS_SHA_YMD = NULL,INS_SHA_ID = #{update.insShaId},INS_SHA_ID = NULL,UPD_SHA_YMD = #{update.updShaYmd},UPD_SHA_YMD = NULL,UPD_SHA_ID = #{update.updShaId},UPD_SHA_ID = NULL, WHERE CODE_NAME = #{search.codeName} AND VALUE1 = #{search.value1}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME = #{codeName} AND VALUE1 = #{value1}
mapper.select: SELECT VALUE1, VALUE1_KANJ FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME = #{inCodeName} AND DEL_FLG = '0' ORDER BY SORT_NUM, VALUE1
SELECT VALUE1, VALUE1 || 'ï¼š' || VALUE1_KANJ VALUE1_KANJ FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME = #{inDataKbn} ORDER BY VALUE1
SELECT VALUE1, VALUE1_KANJ FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME = #{inDataKbn} ORDER BY VALUE1

SELECT DISTINCT TRN_CODE_MST.VALUE1_KANJ VALUE1_KANJ ,TRN_CODE_MST.VALUE1 TRN_VALUE1 ,NVL(DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE1,'') DUMMY_VALUE1 FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST TRN_CODE_MST LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST DUMMY_CODE_MST ON DUMMY_CODE_MST.CODE_NAME = 'DUMMY_HCO' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE2 = TRN_CODE_MST.VALUE1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TRN_CODE_MST.CODE_NAME = 'TRN_KBN' AND TRN_CODE_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' ORDER BY TRN_CODE_MST.VALUE1

SELECT DUMMY_CODE_MST.CODE_KANJ FROM M_RDM_CODE_MST DUMMY_CODE_MST WHERE 1 = 1 AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.CODE_NAME = 'DUMMY_HCO' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE1 = #{inInsNo} --DOC_NO
